'''''Chenyu's Blessings of Sunken Jade''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Chenyu's Splendor]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the {{Quest|An Ancient Sacrifice of Sacred Brocade}}.
